name: You Must Become A Lich
description:
Lichdom is achieved when a powerful magic user separates their soul from their body and feeds on the life force of others to achieve eternal life.

After years of searching, you finally found it. The Coin Carin. You clasp your hands and cast a spell to move the very mountains above you. Mere moments later, you're standing in the main hall of your new Lair. Focusing back, you recall the spell to summon the gold necessary to appease the demons below.


Introducing "You Must Become A Lich" - a Coin Pusher experience that will immerse you in a dark and captivating world. Are you ready to ascend to Lichdom, commanding hordes of monstrous creatures and conquering vast lands? Prepare for an addictive journey like no other!

🌟Diverse Pusher Tables:

Explore 6 unique and meticulously crafted pusher tables, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Push coins strategically and fight cool bosses.

👥Build Your Monstrous Army:

Assemble a legion of monstrous minions to aid you in your quest for Lichdom. Assemble them into powerful beings, ready to fight by your side as you ascend to unholy power.

🏰Siege Lands:

Unleash your monstrous horde to lay siege upon lands, spreading terror and claiming territories. Conquer strategically, expand your influence, and establish your reign as the true lich over all.

💥Conquer Six Epic Bosses:

Test your mettle against six fearsome bosses, each guarding their own treacherous domain. Utilize your skills and gather your forces to overcome these formidable adversaries!

🎮Collectibles Galore:

Unlock an impressive array of collectible items as you push your way to power. From ancient artifacts to legendary treasures, each one brings you closer to Ultimate Lichdom. *Developer Note: These are Patreon rewards from my most influential patrons + the ones that were active when I made this game.

🎩Customize Your Lich:

Unleash your creativity and add visual flair to your lich through a variety of Steam items. Unlock unique customization options, from menacing robes to eerie accessories, and make your mark as the most formidable and stylish lich in the realms.

Get ready to push, conquer, and ascend - Embrace the dark allure of "You Must Become A Lich" and indulge in a coin-pushing experience like no other.

Rise from mere mortal to an immortal lich, with power beyond imagination. Can you conquer the six bosses and claim their dark powers? The realms await your command.

Become the Lich you were destined to be. Add "You Must Become A Lich" to your Steam library today and start your journey towards ultimate power!
